website_summaries.verdict: Top-selling natural sleep aid that includes some melatonin.
pros: In addition to 3 mg of melatonin, blend include sleep-inducers like valerian and L-Theanine
cons: Some suffered from nightmares while taking this product

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my sleeping schedule!
customer_reviews.text: Waited 3 days to write this review. First day I took one pill 30 minutes before going to sleep. I woke up once through the night. Next day took 2 and slept through the entire night. I tend to have a hard time falling asleep as well as waking up through the night. These pills helped fix that! Just a warning, if you have to wake up early the next day plan ahead and take the pill earlier. If you only get 5 or 6 hours of sleep, when you wake up you will feel super sleepy. These pills really work for helping you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Chai

customer_reviews.title: ~ My Sleep Quality is Definitely Improved with These Gentle Herbal Capsules ~
customer_reviews.text: This Gentle Luna Sleep Aid has a great variety of natural sleep herbs/aids contained within. It's pretty amazing to have all those in one capsule. The smell is not overpowering, just a mixed blend of herbs. The capsules are easy to swallow and do not taste strongly on swallowing. I like that the capsules are vegan. I like that they have two safety seals in place and the expiration is stamped on the bottom of the jar and is over a year and a half out. These gentle capsules have definitely helped me sleep better and wake fewer times through the night, if at all. I recommend giving these gentle herbal sleep aid capsules a try.
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Better than most prescription sleep medicines, REALLY!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN AMAZING PRODUCT! I have a lifelong sleep disorder & have used most of the Rx medicines at one time or another. Luna is like a prescription sleeping medicine! I use it every night along with my prescription medication because the Rx doesn't work well enough. For the vast majority of people this herbal treatment will be more than enough to help you get a good night's sleep. I've been using it for 6 months now and is give up my prescription before I gave up this! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED (By by a guy with ansomia!) Five Stars ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
customer_reviews.author: dilworthdude

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried taking most of the ingredients in Luna individually without much luck. Blended together in Luna, however, these ingredients give me a good night’s sleep. Additionally, I’m NOT left feeling groggy the next day (like I am after taking Unisom (Diphenhydramine citrate)). I usually get sleepy about 1 hour after taking the 2 capsules. If you prefer taking drops, Nocturest is great. The taste is sweet+earthy and kicks in 15 minutes after ingesting. PS - Cutting back on caffeine can help too
customer_reviews.author: California Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Try it to sleep, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: A great way to get to sleep and wake up refreshed. I take it at the end of the day and in 30 minutes I am asleep. I wake up alert and refreshed. I am 77 years old and this has been a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Humcas

customer_reviews.title: Wow....Luna works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using zzzquil, ambien, NyQuil just to be able to sleep. However, long term use irritates my GERD. Ambien made me groggy when I wake up. So went to Amazon and searched for natural sleep aid. Luna popped up first with 3k great reviews. So I purchased Luna. I have been happily sleeping very very well. I take 2 capsules. It does not bother my GERD. I am on my second bottle. Company called Nested follow-up with me several times to ensure that I was happy with the product. Nested has great customer service even after the sale. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I have a prescription of Clonazepam for horrible ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have a prescription of Clonazepam for horrible insomnia and other anxiety issues,and I pretty much never need to take the Clonazepam because of this natural alternative. I have sound sleep and it helps me to fall asleep quickly. This supplement is a God-send since I really don't like taking drugs unless needed. I would give this 10 stars instead of 5 if I could. It helps my husband fall asleep too and he will stay up until 5am and it is really annoying, since he works until 11 and then can't sleep. Now he comes to bed at 1:30 and it's really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie M. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews. Many were positive, so I bought a bottle. I have took these now for several days. I am writing this review and it’s 2:13 am. I’ve took two at this point about 3 hours ago. I’m glad if they work for some but I’m not one. I tried to return thru Amazon. You can’t. So to me that’s another mark against this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nyl55

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited with the high reviews to use this product. Unfortunately it did not work for me. I started with one pill and then moved to two. Still did not find it helpful, couldn't fall asleep and woke up a lot through out the night.
customer_reviews.author: mommaoftwo

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something more natural, since I have been taking unisom/benedryl (same active ingredient) for years. And I really wanted this to work, obviously, since sleep is important. First night taking them, and here I am 3am wide awake. I took two, since I figured I would need it, and it was probably 2.5 hours until I got tired. I tossed and turned, and have a headache just as I would with benedryl/unisom. I'll try 3 capsules tomorrow night, and update. Update 9/1: The magic number is 5 capsules, and even then I was tossing and turning all night. Went back to Unisom. Hopefully these work for someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian C

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT WORK. I’m starting to believe that they are paying people to write reviews. I’m a tired mom who just wants to be able to sleep without worrying about 1,000 things. This didn’t do anything for me. I tried taking half the dosage as some other people mentioned worked for them. (I’m only 115lbs) you think it would do SOMETHING. Waste of money and they don’t allow returns.
customer_reviews.author: Neijjjjj

customer_reviews.title: Not the one "for me".
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me! I still wake up at 3am and can't go back to sleep until maybe 5am. I would take two pills at 8pm with an expected bedtime of 10pm but I'm up until maybe 11pm to 11:30pm after taking these. I tried other brands that knocked me out the entire night but made me groggy in the AM around 6ish when I needed to be up. I need something in between Luna and zquil I suppose. Wan!!! Fyi- My sleeping problem is due to me trying to plan my whole life out at night and not to any health issues.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Received spoiled/ Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and received bad/old pills. I know these pills are old because ive ordered in the past and the pills are suppose to be a light grey in color with no spots. These pills did not look fresh at all and after taking one I felt bad. This is ridiculous, people pay good money for this product only to ripped off by with bad product You take our money we deserve the best quality of pills. I hate companies that get really popular and so they start getting cheap and sending the customers old product. Will never be ordering these again. Lost a loyal customer. I will start back ordering iDoze.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. The only thing that helps this pill is the melatonin they put inside. It does not even make me feel drowsy. I do not have sleep problems but I wanted something natural to help put me to sleep faster and deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Hernadez

customer_reviews.title: WARNING THIS PRODUCT IS VERY DANGEROUS1
customer_reviews.text: This product has a mix of different drugs that are 'over the counter' which do not mean that they are drugs. I have a very resistent body to all the medications that I am taking, but this LUNA was very bad for my health. The mix of powerful drugs like Valerian, GABA an Melatonine has made this product very incompatible and dangerous for my health. I had nauseas, dizzines, stomach issues and over all al, does not allow me to sleep. If you decide to take it, be very careful, as it may give you an inestable condition though the day,
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product is helpful in encouraging sleep. You do need to take it approximately 45 minutes before you actually want to be asleep. Also, dosing states to take 2 capsules but as a rule I take 3. I have never had issues getting up in the middle of the night if necessary nor have I felt groggy in the morning. This is the 3rd brand I have tried of this type of supplement and I prefer it over others because thecapsules are easier to swallow and don't have that distinctive taste of valerian.
customer_reviews.author: BMCK

customer_reviews.title: Important side effect that's never mentioned
customer_reviews.text: I've had insomnia all my life and have tried a number of prescription drugs as well as natural sleep remedies. Luna worked well for me BUT after a couple of weeks of taking it I discovered that one of the main ingredients - melatonin - reduces the effectiveness of blood pressure medications. My blood pressure, which was under control by prescription, went way above normal while I was on Luna. Needless to say, I discontinued it immediately and will never again take anything with melatonin in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol on Long Island

customer_reviews.title: I'm Bipolar Type 1 and have chronic insomnia and this product is saving my life
customer_reviews.text: I've always struggled to get more than a few hours of sleep and I currently take Remeron, Ambein, Seroquel, Vistaril and I can usually get 6 or 7 hours of sleep but since I've added this product to my nightly routine I've been sleeping very soundly like REM sleep every night and getting a solid 8 to 9 hours and waking up feeling refreshed and amazing. I highly recommend at least giving this product a try
customer_reviews.author: Troy Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have been an insomniac for almost 20 years. I have tried everything I can get my hands on. I was praying this would bring me some relief. I took two the first night, waited for 4 hours...nothing. Took 4 the next night...still awake hours later. I took 6 tonight and that was 3 hours ago and I feel like I can run a marathon. So unfortunately these do not work at all for me. Hefty price tag for no help. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Once I got to a certain age, staying asleep became harder. Started taking Benadryl, but then heard about the connection with dementia so stopped that right away. Melatonin gave me weird hallucinations and valerian and essential oils like lavender or cedar wood didn’t work. Then found Luna. A great product! I take one about 15-30 minutes before I’m ready to turn out the lights and drift right off. When I start waking up every hour or two starting around 3am (so typical) I can relax right back to sleep and get my 8 hours. Perfect! Wake up refreshed. So good to know they’re all natural. Been using faithfully for a couple years now.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Z

customer_reviews.title: then did not feel like again. I am usually a very
customer_reviews.text: I was completely sceptical but this product has work for me,,In the first few days I felt kind of dizzy after taking the pills,, then did not feel like again.I am usually a very ,very ,very late sleeper so for me in order to work I have to take 2 tablets around 6 or 7 pm because it take a lot of time to start working...again I am usually not the best example in terms of sleeping patterns but as soon as I put me head on the pillow I do not wake until my alarm goes off,,,for me this is a first! I will continue to use this product ,I am already in my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Where's the Beach?

customer_reviews.title: Zombie meds
customer_reviews.text: This product was scary! I found the info about it in an insomnia article online. So I took one pill at around 10 p.m. All night long I had **crazy dreams**. It felt like I was on some kind of crazy drug trip. I don't do drugs but I can imagine that that must be what it feels like! It was almost like fever dreams where you find yourself in some crazy dreamscape yet you are still lucid. I tossed and turned all night. It may help some but this product seemed to worsen my issue. Wish I could get my $ back. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: B Back

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars - recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.text: 10.1.19, I buy the bottle that has the melatonin in it. I've used it now for a couple of years and like it. I don't have trouble going to sleep but going back to sleep sometimes. I've tried several ways of taking it. So, what works for me, is at bedtime I take 2 capsules (with the melatonin) + 1 more melatonin - 5mg. My neurologist said it was OK for me to take it this way. I don't take it every night just when I've had trouble sleeping for 2 -3 nights.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: No returns on this product
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for me except make my tinnitus ringing of the ears worse. Gave a day tried a couple times and ringing was bad the next day. There is no return on this product which i didnt know thinking Amazon would take it back. So before you buy think about if this product doesnt work no returns.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife who had negative side effects.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who has had trouble falling asleep ever since our son was born three and a half years ago. She usually takes zzquil, unisom, or Advil pm. I finally convinced her to try something all natural hoping it would work the same as the others, but would be a healthier alternative. She took it one time and had trouble falling asleep, had burning in her ears, and didn't feel like herself. She told me it mad her feel so bad that she would not take it again.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: Gave us headaches, neckpain, and dyhdration
customer_reviews.text: This product got me to sleep but at a cost. It gave me major headaches neck aches and made me feel really uncomfortable. It was not soothing or relaxing. I'm not happy at all because I can't return the product. I can return the kids one but not the adult one. My daughter got headaches and neckaches on the kids one too. We also did NOT feel refreshed when we woke up just super super sluggish. It also did not help keep my daughter asleep she'd wake up a couple hours later thirsty. I've noticed this product made me super thirsty too.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Makes You Sleepy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, makes me sleepy and keeps me asleep all night. The only downside is that you have to take it 30-60 mins before going to bed, and sometimes I forget and end up taking it right before bed, then just wait for it make me sleepy. I like that it is all-natural, and the capsules don't have a super heavy alfalfa smell like other ones I've tried (DriftOff). The capsules are also smaller than the horse-sized Power To Sleep brand. I just hope it continues to work!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep supplement so far!
customer_reviews.text: I take Ambien and Trazadone for sleep. They work but even with a CPAP I noticed I would wake up for every little noise etc. (usually hissing and leaks from my mask) Luna helps make my sleep more consistent than anything else I've tried. Everyone is different, some have weird reactions to Ambien, I don't. I don't feel groggy in the morning with this product like all the other sleep supplements I've tried. I take it 2 hours before my normal bedtime. Adjust the time as needed for your body. It's subtle so you won't be crawling to your bed on your lips. Happy dreams!
customer_reviews.author: KOZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, but...
customer_reviews.text: Luna's customer service is extremely satisfactory. Their response to e-mails and questions are very prompt, as are their refunds. Even though the product didn't work for me, they refunded me quickly and apologized for the inconvenience. It's still worth a try as this was only my experience, and if it doesn't work, they will simply refund you. Definitely worth it. As for Luna itself, it's effects ranged from nonexistent to mild, but that might be because I have a fairly bad case of insomnia - regularly tossing and turning for a few hours before I fall asleep. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused bizarre dreams and they won’t return. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: This product to help me fall asleep faster but gave me extremely weird dreams and very fitful sleep. It’s like my mind was more awake in my dreams and when I wake up in the morning I don’t feel rested as I’ve been super active in my dreams all night. The really big bummer is that they won’t return this product so now I’m out the money and still can’t sleep.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: our whole family tried this and this didn't work for all five of us. pretty sure it's completely fake. good old melatonin chewables are much better. this is not what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Yermack

customer_reviews.title: Brings me to a sleepy state of mind......
customer_reviews.text: This product makes me feel sleepy, but does not make me fall asleep. I like the product and will continue to purchase it in the future. It helps create a sleepy sensation, but I need a little diphenhydramine HCL to complete the action. Or create a sensation of complete non-action. The two together are perfect for me. 2 LUNA pills and one 50 mg diphenhydramine and I am off to la-la land.
customer_reviews.author: more peace

customer_reviews.title: have cool sheets, put up your tablet
customer_reviews.text: It helps, you have to do your part though, for example, black out the windows, have cool sheets, put up your tablet, exercise, eat well. If you try this product while you are stressed, hungry, in a well lit room with the television blasting in the next room, it won't work! This is not something that will knock you out like a sedative. It will however aid in sleep very well.
customer_reviews.author: David Winter

customer_reviews.title: Must Be Very Effective For Most Citizens
customer_reviews.text: I think that one's ability to sleep is due to so many different factors. No sleep aid will fix a congenital condition of the brain which does not produce enough sleep chemicals nor will it override digestive issues and other issues which interfere with good sleep but God knows how much I have done to sleep well and yet still have an ongoing problem! What this product is doing for me is significant and may very well do also for the reader but the science of sleep is still not what it should be so who knows how well this Luna will really work for the reader!
customer_reviews.author: Grant A. Barbey

customer_reviews.title: BEST SLEEP AID I'VE FOUND YET!
customer_reviews.text: I've had insomnia for many years and I have tried numerous different supplements to help me sleep. I researched every ingredient in LUNA (so I knew the benefit of each one). I've taken LUNA for two months now and I can verify that it has helped me the most. I take liquid magnolia bark along with two capsules of LUNA each night. I've found myself dreaming quite vivid dreams (I have NEVER done that before) which means (I believe) that I'm experiencing REM sleep. I wake up most days feeling like I got a good nights sleep and I'm not groggy all day. Just received my second bottle today. I'm so pleased that I've found this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lt Dan

customer_reviews.title: No effect on me
customer_reviews.text: i tried taking two capsules 3 nights in a row and it didn't have any impact on my sleep. I didn't fall asleep quicker nor did i stay asleep during the night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've always had trouble sleeping. Tried mirtazapine(didn't work) Trazodone(only worked first couple days) Seroquel (knocks me out but can't stay asleep plus I gained a bunch of weight from the munchies, and I was SUPER groggy waking up) I fall sleep fine for the most part but have trouble STAYING asleep I always wake up 2-4 hours after falling asleep.With these I at least get 6 hours sometimes a full 8 before waking up. It's not perfect I do wake up after a few hours time to time but I fall back asleep fine and it's also a better sleep
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Did not Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product because I figured it may be a bit on the milder side for a first time sleep aid user. It turned out to be indeed mild and it had literally zero effect on my sleep. When I took it I found myself tossing and turning in bed still and woke with a mild headache. I tried it numerous times on different days and had my family members try it as well. I wanted to give it a chance and have it work but it still unfortunately did not work for any of us. I suggest getting a regular melatonin only product instead of this with "herbals" and not USP verified.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the least potent snd effective sleep aids I’ve used. After taking the recommended dosage and experiencing no help in sleeping, I doubled the dose and was able to fall asleep easier however it’s such a light effect that that it doesn’t help to keep you asleep. Had much better luck with non natural OTC sleep aids. Benadryl works better than this by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sleep aid!
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a long term prescription that made me drowsy. When I finally stopped, I couldn’t hardly sleep. I was getting less than four hours a night and my health started to suffer. I started taking Luna and it has really turned around. I am sleeping longer and falling asleep faster and find myself relaxed and drowsy about 30-45 mins after taking it. I don’t wake up feeling drowsy, so far I am really happy with the supplement. I don’t need to take it every single night anymore, it’s helped me restrain myself to go to sleep when I need to which is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Kutach

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: So, I give this 2 star, because even though it didn’t help me fall asleep/stay asleep, it does get you tired. I think if you have insomnia or ADHD/anxiety induced insomnia, this probably won’t work for you either. It did get me a little more tired than usual, but it doesn’t help turn the brain off to fall asleep. I really did want this to work, because I don’t want to depend on medication. I’m not a doctor, but my opinion is if you have insomnia, don’t buy this. Save your money for something else. If you have trouble getting tired enough to fall asleep, it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, these pills did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work for me. I took 2 pills every night for one week, and it took me 2 or more hours to go to sleep every night, just like it does when I take nothing to help me sleep. I am back to taking my prescription sleeping pills and sleeping soundly again. I sincerely wish these had worked!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be like a supplement my husband bought me from InfoWars, "Knockout." I guess the decreased amount of melatonin makes a huge difference because taking two of these is the same as taking nothing for me. My problem is going back to sleep if I wake up, and this stuff doesn't help, I stay awake for hours if anything wakes me up. Maybe it will for you, but it doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Abla

customer_reviews.title: Sleepy time in a bottle, without the grogginess
customer_reviews.text: Lately I've been waking up in the middle of the night, and I wanted something that could help me sleep through the night, but without making me feel groggy in the morning like sleeping pills or Nyquil do. I tried Luna's Sleep Aid for the first time the other day, and it gradually made me feel sleepy; I like that it didn't instantly hit me so that I had some time to read in bed before finally falling asleep. Plus, they're really easy to swallow with a cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Blake R

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the great reviews for this product, I had high hopes for a natural alternative sleep aid. Unfortunately, this product did absolutely nothing for me. It does not make me even, slightly, drowsy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe West

customer_reviews.title: gentle
customer_reviews.text: ive taken one pill at night over two and its the perfect strength to gently lull me to sleep. its not too strong where im worried about it, and gentle enough that if you actually do relax in bed and not browse social media, you'll drift off. i have taken one at the computer and have forgotten about it until i took a break it and felt tired. i like that 1 pill works for me in a natural way
customer_reviews.author: Tuu Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do a thing for me.
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions and took 2 capsules one hr. before bed time on the first day. The second day I took 2 capsules also before bed. On both nights I still had problems falling asleep as usual. On the third night I took 3 capsules, again I couldn't fall asleep. On each night after a couple of hours I finally got up and took my 2oz. of whiskey and fell asleep without a problem. 2-3 Oz. of whiskey is my usual remedy, I am just trying to get away from using alcohol as a sleep aid.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Mako

customer_reviews.title: Helped me more than prescribed sleep aids
customer_reviews.text: I am a doctor and I’ve been suffering from insomnia for years. I have been on prescribed sleeping pills which now days barely work. I tried your supplement last night and actually got tired enough to fall asleep. I’ve taken other OTC sleep aids but they wake me up. I just cannot believe your supplement actually helped me. My prescription sleep aid leaves me drowsy the next day and sometimes affects my memory. This supplement made me feel like I received normal sleep without the drowsiness in the morning. I cannot wait to continue this and stop all sleep aids because of their lasting unwanted effects! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Withers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Enter REM Sleep, but no foggy wake-up
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to fall asleep naturally for 8+ years. I was hopeful after seeing the reviews that this might be the solution, all encompassing, that i was looking for. The first two nights i never fell into any type of real sleep. I stuck with it and the next two nights it seemed that it was a solution; however, the past two nights I’ve just tossed and turned and can’t sleep. The one positive is that regardless of it working or not for me it doesn’t give me a “hangover”, foggy feeling in the morning like other sleep aids I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything other than make me nauseous
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how others will react but it had zero effect in terms of helping me sleep. It did however made me VERY nauseous even though I had other supplements with the same ingredients. It doesn't give me any confidence either when I can't find anywhere on the bottle or their website about where the ingredients are sourced from? Only that is "made with love." Looks like is a rebrand of a generic herbal supplement with 2x the price. Also comes in a big fancy green box which is such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Sleep safe
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old son suffers from insomnia. He drives for a living so not getting adequate sleep is a safety concern. I did not want him going on Rx sleep meds if it could be avoided so I purchased this for him to try instead. He is getting better rest and we feel more comfortable using a natural product. He is somewhat dependent on it for sleep (not as in addiction, just he can’t routinely fall sleep without taking it.) He’s been taking this for over a year without any side effects. He experiences fewer migraines than he did prior to starting it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Kay Knight-Abney

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I have used a prescription sleep aid for many years, but in the past year it has been quite the process trying to get refills from my doctor. I read the reviews for Luna and decided to try it for myself. Luna has worked as well as any prescription sleep aid I have ever used, plus it feels better knowing it's all natural and non-habit forming. I would highly recommend this product to anyone having trouble sleeping. It's gentle and I've had no problems with feeling "drugged" upon waking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good night's sleep still eludes me.
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for this formula in Luna. I wake up every night between 2 and 3 am and cannot get back to sleep. Sadly, after 3 nights with 2 capsules 30 minutes before bedtime, there has been no improvement. Ambien is the only substance that gets me back to dreamland - it's only available on prescription! If you guys stand by your guarantee, I would appreciate a refund. Send a check to me at: 1278 Teaches Cove Rd, oriental, NC 28571 or work with Amazon where I ordered the Luna. Thanks, Andy Roberts
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Improved daughter's quality of life.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my adult daughter who has had much difficulty staying asleep then feeling tired the next day. This works great. She is sleeping great and there are no side affects. She is very happy and uses it every night. I chose Luna by Nestor because it had really good reviews and I researched the natural ingredients and found them acceptable. We are glad we found this product. We mentioned it to her doctor who had prescribed a pill with unacceptable side affects and he told her to take it since it was working and the pill wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect, but Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Being on several prescription medications and having a problem sleeping, I checked with my doctor and pharmacist about trying something non prescription on occasion that wouldn’t interact with my medications (many herbal remedies do). I was taking another product that was much more expensive until I found this. Like the other product, it’s not perfect, but when I do take it, I am at least able to get 4-5 hours of solid sleep, sometimes a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Red Celt

customer_reviews.title: Headache
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both took 2 pills each and noticed no difference in sleep or sleep quality (per Fitbit sleep analysis). The next morning I woke up dizzy and had a headache all day. Dizzy to the point that I couldn’t do my morning workout and it scared me. I didn’t take it a second time but my husband did. Again no improvements and he said they make him groggy the next day. I know we’re all different but in this house they are going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: EitherOr

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a good 7 hours of sleep, but feel it a little the next day.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well for my primary insomnia, although I do feel as though I don't quite "shake it off" the next day - not that it hinders me in any way, but I still feel more tired than I'd like to feel after sleeping 7 hours, if that makes sense. It generally provides me 7 hours of sleep. My only complaint is that it's regularly sold out and only available online. I'm giving Dreamrite a try next since it has basically the same ingredients at the same levels.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: No drowsiness, just great rest
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. I was worried about waking up feeling groggy at first since this has 10 mg of melatonin in it, so I cut the dosage in half for the first few nights. After about a week, I was able to take both pills and sleep throughout the night without waking up. In the morning, I'm able to get up and out of bed without yawning or having any fogginess that I would have with Tylenol PM.
customer_reviews.author: YeroC

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was really optimistic about this product based on the huge number of positive reviews. I have pretty consistent insomnia. I can often fall asleep but wake up around 3 am and then stay awake the rest of the night. This product did not help with the 3 am wake up at all. I tried it several times with no luck. I have spent so much money on sleep products and I really thought this would be the one to finally help. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this product does help me fall asleep easier, but it is not helping me stay asleep or get restful sleep. My Fitbit thinks I'm actually awake for 1-2 hours straight in the middle of the night, and I get less REM sleep. I suspect it is the valerian root that doesn't agree with me; when I have Sleepytime tea with valerian root, the same thing happens. A glass of milk gives me better results than these pills.
customer_reviews.author: bettylion

customer_reviews.title: Loses Potency
customer_reviews.text: Initially, these pills were great. I had trouble sleeping and they are natural and they did knock me out right away. However, after using it 3-4 times they begin to lose potency. I only use them now every once in a while in another attempt to stay asleep during the night but not much to my satisfaction. Maybe they work for other people and that first night of sleep was marvelous, but wasn't worth the product
customer_reviews.author: Ranssel R.

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep aid I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have always had trouble falling and staying asleep. Drugs like Benadryl don’t work and tend to create anxiety instead of relaxing me. I tried melatonin but it upset my stomach. Valerian helped me fall asleep some of the time. I have been using Luna for a couple of months and it has been the best sleep aid I have tried. It relaxes me and helps me fall asleep. I rarely sleep through the night but I’m sleeping much better over all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cox

customer_reviews.title: Insomnia-Be-Gone
customer_reviews.text: This stuff knocks me out super fast, and has been AMAZING for keeping me asleep as well. I've had problems with insomnia most of my life, and it's great to have a product that helps so much now. Not not does it keep me asleep, but I don't wake up groggy. I find I wake up with energy now and ready for the day, whereas before it'd take a swat team to get me out from under the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest A. Oporto III

customer_reviews.title: You can not return it
customer_reviews.text: I thought to try it due to good reviews but I didn't find it useful for me. My mind was heavy when I got up in the morning. Hence I thought to return it but found this vendor doesn't accept the return. So I thought to inform others. I am trying now an adrenal based product which is for night time and finding it excellent. Everybody is different hence people should be given a chance to try and return. Hence 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rana

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully with no after effects
customer_reviews.text: My son was stricken with insomnia that came on him suddenly. The only thing that had worked was Excedrin PM but we were concerned about him using it for sleeping purposes. I got on Amazon and saw this product and decided to give it a try. My son was so happy when he used it. It helped him fall asleep and after a week, almost two, he no longer needed it. We are so thankful for these natural products that work so wonderfully, we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Romo

customer_reviews.title: At last...something that works
customer_reviews.text: I have found this product to be very helpful. I ended up taking 2 pills each night and most nights I wake up refreshed, having slept through the night. If I have had to get up in the middle of the night, I am able to get back to sleep without a problem. At one point I ordered a liquid form where the ingredients seemed the same, thinking it might be easier to titrate the amount needed to be more effective. The liquid was not as helpful. I do think you have to use it for a few days, almost like training your body to respond effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: They worked great for several months and now I get nothing from ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for several months and now I get nothing from them. I think my body has gotten tolerant of them and I need more. I took 1 tablet nightly for 3 months and then they no longer worked. I tried 2 each night and that lasted about a month. I will not take more than 2. I just bought another product and will give it a try. I may go back to Luna again later if I have a problem with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: At a time when sleep is hard to get, this stuff works. I take it before bed and half an hour later I am asleep. Sometimes I wake up in the night and have to take another but it is still the closest thing to a full nights sleep I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: You'll sleep, but wake up groggy
customer_reviews.text: YMMV, but these made it an absolutely pain to wake up. The product does what it says - it helps you sleep and stay asleep. I just can't sacrifice my energy in the morning and these pills made it way too difficult to get up and go. My suggestion is a product called Best Rest - really expensive but excellent. I can't afford it right now so I tried these . Great product, just looks a little too well.
customer_reviews.author: Rrosa

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the purchase.m
customer_reviews.text: I always appreciate when customers take the time to review product and since so many people have given Luna high rating, i decided to give it a try. So far so good, I do believe it helps me get back to sleep when I wake up at midnight or 1:00 am and I think it helps me fall asleep too. I will continue to use and evaluate. Next time I'll try the Luna without the melatonin since it's the one ingredient I'm not crazy about. The company has great follow up as well, always nice to know they care about their product after the sale. Thanks fellow reviewers for sharing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess it didn’t work for me. I tried different products as sleep aid natural products and this one is the least effective for me. I stopped taking it as I didn’t see any effects and will go back to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Yudisney Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Me as an overthinker can always be inclined to think what could I have done more with my day or what I should do before I go to sleep. I purchased Luna to help me go to sleep faster and stay asleep longer. In the week that I have taken it it has allowed for that and then some. I never thought I would have trouble falling asleep as an adult because I never had that issue as a kid. Now with Luna I can sleep like a baby again.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Townsend

customer_reviews.title: A good night’s sleep!
customer_reviews.text: We received our bottles of Luna - one for me and one for my husband. This is a reorder, and I really love the fact that the capsules contain all natural herbs to help lull us to sleep. We have found Luna to be very effective, and it really promotes a lovely deep sleep for the night while still allowing us to wake up feeling alert and not drowsy in the morning. Thank you for creating this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wyldeflowyr

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as good as I hoped. I am a die hard believer in sleep aids. I've been on ADD meds for 15 years now, so I'm always looking for the next big thing. It worked for about two weeks, i started off with one pill the first weeks then had to try two pills the next week and it lost its sparkle. I'm saddened by this. Oh well, on to the next one!
customer_reviews.author: annaleah

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Works in the opposite way - I wake up with ~6 hours sleep every time I take them. I thought this is a sleep aid, but all it did was helping me wake up earlier than usual. I'll be going back to DRIFTOFF.
customer_reviews.author: Alxender

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Ambien and other prescription meds along with several other herbal remedies throughout the years. I have been wanting to return to a simpler, more natural routine for some time now. So, after reading all the great reviews, I was SO EXCITED to try this product. I was so disappointed..!! :(( It just didn't work for me.. it helped to relax me, but that's about it - the quest continues....
customer_reviews.author: ac3013

customer_reviews.title: Best natural sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I have had sleeping issues for over 10 years, and I have tried pretty much everything. This product has just the right ingredients at just the right amounts. It has helped me sleep better than any other natural sleep aid that I have tried. My husband has been taking NyQuil to get a good night’s sleep for the past couple of years, and he is now taking this product and feels much more refreshed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Genesys11

customer_reviews.title: If you can't sleep buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time sleeping and I've tried teas, oil diffusers, lots of home remedies and nothing helps. I got these as a sample and I slept like a baby so I bought these and have been seeing them since. Being an essential worker I have been working lots of hours and super stressed out so finally being able to have some good night sleep has been amazing. I have already recommended them to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Aleida

customer_reviews.title: Works great 😊
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a all natural solution to help me get a peaceful night's sleep. I had no problem falling asleep but once I reached REM I would start having horrible stress dreams, every night. These dreams were so bad that they would wake me up and I was so stressed I couldn't go back to sleep. Thanks to these wonderful little sleep helpers I can sleep PEACEFULLY. I'm thinking it's probably the GABA that has been so helpful, but hey, I don't know, I'm no scientist... I'm just thankful.
customer_reviews.author: J M Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I received 21 pills!!️ Package was sealed completely so idk, just weird. I contacted customer service and was told that this is a non returnable item. Ok I get that... But I'm not returning it because I didn't like it, I'm returning it because I received 21 pills when I paid for a full bottle. I had to talk to 2 different representatives before someone finally agreed to just give me a refund. So in conclusion I'm not impressed with Luna nor Amazon prime because they both dropped the ball!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan1

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for a good nights sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble falling asleep for about 2 years now. I also work night shift as a nurse so sleep is something that’s hard to come by these days 😴 I have tried just about everything and was recently using diphenhydramine. I wanted to try something new and came across Luna. I am pleasantly surprised as to how fast I fell asleep after taking, and didn’t wake up one time!! I have used it 3 times now and have had great sleep each time! I would definitely recommend people to try this!
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: Finally Something That Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product, as I have tried many others like it in the past. i read the reviews and decided to give it a try. I suffer from insomnia that is fueled by anxiety and my inability to shut off my mind. This product has actually worked and I have been getting restful sleep without the use of anxiety medication. I take it about 1 hour before bed. I am very surprised that it actually worked. I definitely recommend trying it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for the hectic work life!
customer_reviews.text: This product works excellent with me! I travel a lot for work which messes with my slepping pattern. So, taking this after a long week of work helps me to catch up on my sleep properly and kind of reset my sleeping pattern! It leaves u with a very refreshed feel when u wake up too. The best part is it is totally not addicting!
customer_reviews.author: Ahad

customer_reviews.title: Helps you fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: This product does help you fall asleep but for me anyway it doesn't keep me asleep all night. I almost always wake up after 4 hours and can't get back to sleep. When I do this i have started taking another one then which has helped. I wouldn't say I feel refreshed in the morning but I don't feel overly tired because of taking one half way through the night.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Not fda approved, prop warning
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give these a shot while having trouble sleeping but after looking at the warnings I decided otherwise. It’s not officially approved and there is a warning that it is prepared in facilities exposed to lead. I decided to go another route with my sleep issues.
customer_reviews.author: smarthomelife

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results, have tried many sleep aids and have little success with sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Three people in my family tried the Luna will little results. Most sleep medication prescriptions and non-prescriptions are all types of sedatives you just have to find what works for you. I have been on sleep medication for most of my life and have found diet/exercise and a good sleeping habit are the best ways to get a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Better Than A Prescription!  Perfect For Non-24!
customer_reviews.text: I'm proud to be a regular user of Luna. Before finding it, I had tried over-the-counter and prescription sleep aids to help battle against the Non-24 that comes with total blindness. Luna fixed this and there are, at least for me, zero side-effects. If you suffer from Non-24, and have had no luck finding the tool to get your brain to make Melatonin , give Luna a try. It is truly amazing in how it can make a regular sleep-cycle return when it was lost to total blindness.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no “hangover”, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: No icky taste, easy to swallow. I’m a long term insomniac and I’ve tried a ton of different sleep meds, over the counter and prescription. Most don’t work or have awful side effects. This one works consistently with no hangover the next morning, no weird behavior, no forgetfulness etc. I’ve recommended this product to friends, family and even a couple of doctors
customer_reviews.author: G. Crago

customer_reviews.title: Helpful sleeping aid
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I am a nurse and after a long stressful day I like taking this supplement for a relaxing and restful sleep. I like that it doesn’t have any strong ingredients and I know it’s safe and natural. I usually have trouble falling asleep but this helps me a lot when I am tossing and turning. This is a great alternative for prescription medications if you’re looking for something to help you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: HUGE improvement in my sleep--and no grogginess!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because I do still wake up at some point every night, but it's easier for me to go back to sleep when I've taken Luna than when I haven't. My quality of sleep has improved significantly, and I don't have that awful groggy feeling the next morning that you get with some of the OTC products on the market. I feel safer, too, taking this product than other OTC products that are full of chemicals and questionable ingredients. I take Luna typically every weeknight when I know I have to be up earlier for work, and I get such a better night's sleep now!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would’ve worked for me-
customer_reviews.text: When I first started taking this product I thought it would be my saving grace. My first week I took 1 pill 30 minutes before bedtime. I slept fairly sound. The second week with the same dose I began to wake up 2 hours after falling asleep. On my 3rd week I upped my dosage to 2 pills before bedtime. The same as when I first began. Slept soundly the first week but woke up a 2-3 hours thereafter. On the plus side, I did not have a groggy feeling upon waking for my day. I Really wished this would’ve worked better for me.
customer_reviews.author: MommaKC

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT! YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS PRODUCT! YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT! I’ve always had really bad sleeping/insomnia issues. Lately I’ve been sleeping very bad to the point where I couldn’t remember the last time I had a good nights rest. When I received these LUNA tablets, I was instantly excited just from all the great reviews I read and boy they did not let me down! I took 2 tablet about 45 mins before bedtime and I slept like a baby! I did not wake up once! Do yourself a favor and give these a try! Absolutely amazing!! +++
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: From 2 hours to 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: As long as I can remember, I have tossed and turned when trying to go to sleep. Seems like my mind goes into full-speed mode when I lie down and it takes anywhere from half an hour to sometimes two hours before I fall asleep. I started taking Luna five months ago, just one pill at night, and now I would say the norm is just ten minutes and I'm asleep. I don't even remember switching which side I'm lying on anymore before I fall asleep. I've taken it anywhere from an hour before bed to lying down and then remembering I forgot to take it. It does work quickly and I definitely get more and better sleep now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hill

customer_reviews.title: I had great hope for this given the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: I had great hope for this given the positive reviews. Although, my experience may be limited to my metabolism. Shortly after ingesting one capsule, I got a weird headache, similar to a high-blood pressure feeling. This being said, I did sleep without waking up until morning. However, upon waking I had a horrible headache, nausea and sleep hangover. This experience happened twice; once after I just received the product and again a few months later for a second try. Unfortunately, I gave it the benefit of the doubt and waited too long to return. I'll give it away with full-disclosure.
customer_reviews.author: DP Northern VA USA

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work....
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product did nothing for me. I just want a good nights sleep. Why can’t someone fix insomnia? My doctor doesn’t want to prescribe Xanax because of it’s negative health issues. I’m guessing she sleeps better than I do. The negative health issues from 30 years of insomnia are debilitating. What possible damage could a Xanax do???
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this now for a few nights and it has worked great! I've tried so many sleep aids over the past 2 years, and nothing has worked quite like this has. The 6mg of melatonin along with all of the other helpful herbal supplements is a perfect combination for restful sleep. Another bonus is waking up alert and ready to start the day, instead of fuzzy and groggy. If you are looking for 6+ hours of solid sleep a night then this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Heater

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the results from Luna. I have tried Lunesta and Ambien but Luna helps me to fall asleep fast and not so deep that I do strange things, I feel refreshed upon waking. The first few nights I tried it I woke up earlier than my alarm but I have found the right time to take it according to my schedule and it works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Garrett

customer_reviews.title: really helps you sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this sleep aid for a while and it really seems to help me fall a sleep and it seems to help me stay a sleep. I don't have any complaints and I have been buying it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: kyoungblood

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a bunch of holistic sleep aids, and these definitely work the best. I do get a full nights rest. The main reason for the 3 stars is I still wake up feeling groggy (that morning Nyquil feeling) and was hoping to feel more refreshed and rested, but it took me a while to wake up (even after 8+ hrs of sleep). So I'd recommend taking them a couple hours before bedtime to ensure they 'wear off' in time for your alarm
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this a few times already and wow! This stuff knocks me out. I have a hard time getting to sleep and staying asleep. When I take this, I actually have only been taking 1 pill instead of the recommended 2, and I have woken up the next morning not even realizing I fell asleep lol! This stuff works and I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Luna | #1 Sleep Aid on Amazon | Naturally Sourced Ingredients | 60 Non-Habit Forming Vegan Capsules | Herbal Supplement with Melatonin, Valerian Root, Chamomile | Sleeping Pills for Adults
feature_bullets: NATURAL SLEEP SUPPLEMENT | LUNA is a gentle herbal sleep supplement made with safe, naturally sourced, scientifically-backed ingredients that are non-habit forming and will encourage a healthy and balanced sleep schedule.

DEEP, RESTFUL SLEEP EVERY NIGHT | Every so often, falling asleep and/or staying asleep can be a challenge and on those mornings it’s difficult to wake up fresh and energized. LUNA contains 6mg of melatonin in each serving to help support a normal, better sleep pattern so you can wake up feeling refreshed.

A BOOST OF L-THEANINE & GABA | L-Theanine is an amino acid found in green tea; GABA is a neurotransmitter produced by the body but also found in some fermented foods. Both of these ingredients promote healthy sleep habits and relaxation.

HERBAL BLEND FOR A SLEEPY BEDTIME | The LUNA formula includes a blend of herbs that people have been using for centuries to relax and sleep better. Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Passionflower and Hops are known for their calming and soothing properties. Valerian Root promotes a healthy sleep cycle.

LOVE LUNA, OR YOUR MONEY BACK | Hello, we’re Nested Naturals. We're confident you'll love us, but if you don't, you’re backed by our Lifetime Guarantee. Call or email us for a full refund. There's no hitch!
